name: Scurvy Seadogs: Pants On Fire
description:
It's a hard life being a pirate, especially when the scorching Caribbean sun threatens to set your pants alight at any moment! The aim of the game is to collect as much booty as you can - not to mention buckets of water to cool your grunt's overheating pants - while avoiding the various hazards and obstacles that litter the land. Do you have what it takes to battle your way through 16 scenic beach, jungle, dock, and village levels, grab the treasure, and escape with your pants intact?


GAMEPLAY
Swipe left, right, up, and down to guide your pirate grunt around the islands in order to collect the various doubloons, gems, treasure chests, and magic potions that appear throughout each level. Avoid crashing into rocks, fences, or shark-infested waters, and watch out for the cunningly tenacious cannons which track the grunt as he moves. Oh, and don't forget to keep an eye on the "Pants-o-Meter" - if your grunt gets too hot, his pants will start smoking, then burst into flames!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.


FEATURES
* A fun and frantic test of skill and reflexes!
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* A bounty of booty to collect!
* A bevy of powerful potions to aid you on your quest!
* Three dastardly cannon types to to avoid!
* Multiple Playing Modes, including Quick Play and Endless!
* Beautifully realized scenic 3D environments!
